content:
- **Enhanced Documentation Update System**: Comprehensive JSON-driven documentation update workflow with templates, automation, and conflict resolution
  - Advanced Python script with multiple update modes and templates
  - Automated workflow processing with PR creation and archival
  - Support for changelogs, TODO lists, README sections, and badge updates
  - Interactive mode and dry-run capabilities for safe operations
  - Complete documentation and usage examples in [docs/documentation-updates.md](docs/documentation-updates.md)
